scripts.test:search: node -e "require('.').searchLabels({ query: { search: process.argv[1] } }, { set: () => {}, status: () => ({ send: r => console.log(r) }) })"
scripts.test:label: node -e "require('.').searchLabels({ query: { label: process.argv[1], year: process.argv[2] } }, { set: () => {}, status: () => ({ send: r => console.log(r) }) })"
